titles.title: Make your calling and election sure,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make your calling and election sure,
Make your calling and election sure,
Make your calling and election sure,
For if you do these things you shall never fall.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So an entrance shall be ministered unto you
Abundantly into the everlasting kingdom
Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ,
And if you do these things you shall never fall.
